Posts.Content: cathyjj wrote: Has anyone had a pathology from a core biopsy that reads mucin with no carcinoma? I guess mucin is a precursor to cancer??? I have been searching the web but, that is only terrifying? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: core biopsie cathyjj dtol

Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2010 04:17PM cathyjj wrote: Hi Shellbell, I totally understand....................I had my core biopsie a month ago. And Thursday I am going in for my exisional biopsie................Just put your Trust in GOD he will lift you up!!!!!
Posts.Title: Biopsy today shellbell74 Inspireme

Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2010 07:22PM cathyjj wrote: Well, I was diagnosed on my core biopsie with stromal and intraductal calcificationst with mucin.. I had my excisional biopsie a week ago and mine came out benign......................I had researched the internet on mucin and was terrified with the results I found. So, try not to research it to much because it causes fear. Put your Trust in God and he will help you. Its hard I know I had to wait 5 weeks to get through it all. In my prayers.Â
